title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.14 - Injectors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.14 - Injectors

State Regulations

Injectors must be kept in good condition, free from
scale, and must be tested before each trip. Boiler checks, delivery pipes, feed-water pipes, tank hose, and tank valves must be kept in good condition, free from leaks and from foreign substances which would obstruct the flow of
water. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
922.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
